    • Constructor Detail

      • ProducerBuilder

        public ProducerBuilder(java.lang.String base,
                       ChannelAuth auth)

        Constructor for ProducerBuilder

        Parameters:
        base - base URL at which the streaming service resides.
        auth - Authentication object to use for channel requests.

    • Method Detail

      • withProducerPathPrefix

        public ProducerBuilder withProducerPathPrefix(java.lang.String producerPathPrefix)

        Set the producerPathPrefix to be used at build() when creating Producer instance

        Parameters:
        producerPathPrefix - Path to append to producer-related requests made to the streaming service. Note that if the pathPrefix parameter is set to a non-empty value, the pathPrefix value will be appended to producer-related requests instead of the producerPathPrefix value.
        Returns:
        this ProducerBuilder instance

      • withCertificateBundle

        public ProducerBuilder withCertificateBundle(java.lang.String verifyCertBundle)

        Set the certificate bundle chain to be used at build() when creating Producer instance

        Parameters:
        verifyCertBundle - CA Bundle chain certificates. This string shall be either the certificates themselves or a path to a CA bundle file containing those certificates. The CA bundle is used to validate that the certificate of the authentication server being connected to was signed by a valid authority. If set to an empty string, the server certificate will not be validated.
        Returns:
        this ProducerBuilder instance

      • withHttpProxy

        public ProducerBuilder withHttpProxy(HttpProxySettings httpProxySettings)

        Set the httpProxySettings to be used at build() when creating Producer instance

        Parameters:
        httpProxySettings - contains http proxy hostname, port, username and password.
        Returns:
        this ProducerBuilder instance

      • build

        public Producer build()
               throws TemporaryError

        Build a Channel object using the previously set parameters and expose it as a Producer object.

        Returns:
        a Producer object which only exposes the Channel.produce(ProducerRecords), Channel.produce(String) and Channel.close() methods
        Throws:
        TemporaryError - if Channel http client request object failed to be created.
